name: Cretan Young Farmers Network
goal:
It is a regional advocacy network of young farmers fighting for the future of agriculture.
We change policy, build networks, and provide business services to ensure all young farmers have the chance to succeed.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Communication, Consumers, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
Our network aims at assisting Cretan young farmers in navigating business challenges and opportunities such as food safety regulations, EU backed loan programs, and crop insurance.

Policy presents many of the most impactful opportunities to help young farmers. We focus on key issues such as access to affordable land, credit, and healthcare. Young Farmersâ€™ campaigns mobilize farmers and supporters across the nation for change.
